participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and competitive, enjoys physical activities and has a strong dislike for certain colors.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Elliot
participant_2.personality: Mysterious and spirited, embraces life with a sense of adventure and a love for celebration.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.
